text: Litzendorf is a community in the Upper Franconian district of Bamberg. It has been a unified community since 1 May 1978. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official site * View over of Litzendorf * "Franconian Switzerland" * Heraldic blazon * Singersâ€™ memorial near Melkendorf Category:Bamberg (district)
